Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. I believe it could significantly enhance your daily routine or professional endeavors. For this unique opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $150. This is a special deal considering the high-quality materials and advanced features we've incorporated into this product. I trust it will meet or exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
